response.overview: After a risky back surgery, Stéphane ends up paralyzed. He’s told that he will never be able to walk again. After years of suffering, he finds a possible path to healing in practicing yoga. His journey will not only bring him back in touch with himself, but also open him to the world. In the farthest reaches of the earth, he will meet more fascinating people that have been saved thanks to yoga.
response.title: Breathe: Yoga Saved my Life
